game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
This class represents an instance of a game.
Game(GameServerTUI, int) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructor that initialises this game's id, the terminal view, and sets the game started to false since the game only starts after both players have sent in their boards.

This class represents a game board for a client.
